attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is reported that Mr Blair is going to Berlin on March 25 to sign the European declaration and in future intends commit the UK to support the proposed EU constitution. This will remove our rights to veto, create an Unelected EU President and an EU defence minister as well as erase our right to independent laws. It will also make the UK voice in international affairs extinct.

Do you want to be governed totally governed by the EU? Do you no longer want the UK to have a voice in international affairs and politics? Do you want to no longer be able to chose who governs our country?

If you do not want to become a prisoner of the EU, sign this petition today.

the Brit

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
